fn.p: The authors declare there are no competing interests.

Eli S.J. Thoré conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Arnout F. Grégoir conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, approved the final draft.
Bart Adriaenssens analyzed the data, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Charlotte Philippe performed the experiments, approved the final draft.
Robby Stoks authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Luc Brendonck contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, approved the final draft.
Tom Pinceel contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
The following information was supplied relating to ethical approvals (i.e., approving body and any reference numbers):
All experiments and methods were approved by the ethical committee of KU Leuven (file number: P070/2016).
The following information was supplied regarding data availability:
Data are available in the Supplemental Files.
